    • Method Detail

      • computeMean

        public java.lang.Double computeMean(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> al)
        This method computes the mean of the temperatures the server receives
        Parameters:
        al - the array with the temperatures
        Returns:
        the mean value of all the temperatures

      • failureHandler

        public void failureHandler(RegularCom rc,
                  AdminCom ac,
                  KeepAliveBroadcaster kab,
                  FailureListener fl,
                  UserCom uc)
        The method "kills" the threads that are given as arguments. The method re-starts them after a timeout of 10 seconds.
        Parameters:
        rc - a RegularCom class that is to be terminated
        ac - an AdminCom class that is to be terminated
        kab - to be terminated
        fl - to be terminated
        uc - to be terminated

      • run

        public void run()
        Listens for a connection from the user. It receives 2 types of messages: Request temp - replies to the user with the mean temp Failure message - simulates the failure of the admin node State request - replies with a list of available nodes
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
